Info.mobileDesc: We support Orange and MTN MOMO for payments
Info.supportDesc: 24/7 live chat to answer all your questions

Hero.notification: Free Delivery on your first order ! Register now and start buying.
Hero.title: One click away from your Local Store.

Step.title: How does it work
Step.title3: Place your order and earn points
Step.descrip1: Tell us where you want your order delivered. We will only show you products available in your area.
Step.descrip2: Browse our wide range of bulk food products and add everything you need to your cart.
Step.descrip3: Confirm your order, choose the delivery time, and start earning loyalty points with every purchase.

Awaiting.title: Awaiting payment
Awaiting.description: Please wait while we send the debit request to the number you provided.
Awaiting.step1: Check the notifications on your phone.
Awaiting.step2: Confirm the transaction from the Orange Money app or via the SMS received.
Awaiting.conclusion: Once confirmed, you will receive a receipt by email and your order will be completed.

Success.title: Payment successfully validated!
Success.description: Payment confirmed! Thank you for your purchase. Your order is being processed. Check your email for more details.

Login.description: Welcome back! Please log in to access your account.

SignUp.description: Join us! Create an account to get started. Fill in your details below to register.
SignUp.name: Full name *
SignUp.accept: By continuing, you agree to Loumo's terms and conditions.

Password.description: Forgot your password? No worries. Enter your email below and we'll send you a link to reset it.
Password.confirmed: We sent you an email on
Password.instruction: open the email and click verify

ChangePassword.description: Secure your account by updating your password. Your new password must be unique.
